thread.title: No. 22 Butler knocks off No. 2 Villanova for second time this season
thread.title_full: No. 22 Butler knocks off No. 2 Villanova for second time this season

author: Nicole Auerbach
title: No. 22 Butler knocks off No. 2 Villanova for second time this season
text:

Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs No. 22 Butler knocks off No. 2 Villanova for second time this season Nicole Auerbach , USA TODAY Sports 11:27 p.m. ET Feb. 22, 2017 Butler Bulldogs guard Kethan Savage (11) and Villanova Wildcats guard Josh Hart (3) tangle for a loose ball. (Photo: Bill Streicher, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
VILLANOVA, Pa. — Butler has the two most impressive wins of this college basketball season — and they’ve come against the same team: Villanova. 
The Wildcats, who were the nation’s top-ranked team the first time these teams met and No. 2 as of Wednesday night, may be headed for a No. 1 seed come NCAA tournament team. 
But their kryptonite is clear, and it’s Butler. 
After a back-and-forth game, the Bulldogs used an 18-0 run late in the second half to take control of the game and beat Villanova 74-66, handing the Wildcats their first loss in The Pavilion, the on-campus arena, since Feb. 3, 2013.
